title: Funding from a Place of Trust
summary: Produced by Synergos with support from the Citi Foundation this report focuses on the importance of General Operating Support (GOS) and Capacity Building (CB). The report offers insights and case studies on how funders can better support this flexible type of funding approach and sheds light on how the flow of GOS and CB funding ultimately drives the outcomes achieved by nonprofits at the community level.
tag-1: Funding from a Place of Trust
